Pre-Game Insights: The T20 World Cup 2024 starts on 1 June with a match between co-hosts USA and Canada at the Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The T20 World Cup 2024 will be hosted in the USA and West Indies with 20 teams participating, including nine associate teams.
Others: India will play their first match against Ireland on 5 June, followed by matches against Pakistan, USA, and Canada.
